misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Espoo Ringside Golf his home club.  He has a consistent history of participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée, having competed in the tournament every year since 2022.

His dedication to the game is evident in his impressive performance record. While he has yet to claim the Victor trophy for the best individual score, his achievements include a remarkable win at the 2020 Hector Trophée, showcasing his exceptional skill and strategic prowess under pressure.

Beyond his competitive spirit, Pekka is known for his meticulous preparation.  Some might say he's almost overly dedicated to course maintenance, often watering the greens far more than necessary. This attention to detail translates to his game; he leaves no stone unturned in his pursuit of excellence.  He is a player to watch in this year’s competition.
